TopicTitle: wtb mod for action grouping engine thrust

Articles.Content:
ive started to delve into making a shuttle ... ive managerd to build a pretty stable shuttle that does get into orbit with the help of mechjeb ... 

however i believe mechjeb is in some forms a cheat and most definatly to get my shuttle into orbit because of all the trust adjustments i have to do whilst flying i certainly consider it cheating ... as i cannot fly the thing myself and perform all the thrust adjustments at the same time im just unhappy ... so im wondering if there is a mod out there that will allow me to action group my thrust adjustments so i can concentrate on flying the thing and just have to hit my action groups to achieve the desired thrust adjustment

Which kind of thrust adjustment? If you are looking for something to automatically vary engine thrust so the center of thrust lines up with the center of mass, there is Davon Throttle Control or Throttle Control Adjustment mods out there.

If you are looking for a mod that allows you to bind "set thrust limit percentage to X%" for a specific engine to an action group, I am not aware of an existing mod that does that. I am currently working on one that will do that, but it's no where near ready for release. (Currently looking at first release in the 3 to 4 weeks from now range.)

You might also like [Davon Throttle Control](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/38069), which allows you to put engines or groups of engines on separate, independently-controlled throttles.

If you're looking for the easy route, look up a mod called Throttle Controlled Avionics. It automatically throttles your engines to ensure that your thrust vector points through your CoM. If you want something more interesting, watch ShimmytheJJ or EJ\_SA on twitch, they do a lot of shuttles with stock, or near stock designs. Long story short, their designs involve rotating the shuttle engines so that they push towards the CoM, and the thrust vector stays centered. Here is a past broadcast by shimmy that is mostly him tweaking his [shuttle design](http://www.twitch.tv/shimmythejj/v/4660365) to work.
